definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

pinyin: shuang1 ceng2 gong1 gong4 qi4 che1

sentences.english: Bus routes and railways, both overground and underground, converged on the station.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車線路和地上地下路軌都在該站交匯。
這趟公共汽車中途不停。

sentences.english: The bus and the van collided.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車與客貨車相撞。

sentences.english: Is the office near public transport, either the subway or a bus station?
sentences.chinese: 新辦公室離公共交通工具，地鐵或者公共汽車站近嗎？

sentences.english: The bus disgorged a crowd of noisy children.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車上湧下來一羣嘰嘰喳喳的孩子。

sentences.english: You can take the bus and get off at the second stop.
sentences.chinese: 你可以坐公共汽車第二站下。

sentences.english: You can change at Madison avenue for the No. 15 bus.
sentences.chinese: 您可以到麥迪遜街換15路公共汽車。

sentences.english: The old bus bumped along the mountain road.
sentences.chinese: 舊公共汽車沿著山路顛簸行駛。

sentences.english: A stranger accosted him on the bus.
sentences.chinese: 一位陌生人在公共汽車上同他搭訕。

sentences.english: Do you know where I can buy a bus ticket to Tian'anmen Square?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我在哪裏買去天安門的公共汽車票嗎？

sentences.english: Should take after the bus , not to vie with each other , not bicheng bit crowded.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐公共汽車應先下後上，勿爭先恐後，勿擠逼搶位。

sentences.english: As soon as the bus stopped, more than fifty people tried to crush in.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車一停住，五十多人馬上一齊往上擠。

sentences.english: You can take No. 28 bus to Guangming Farm.
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐28路公共汽車去光明農場。

sentences.english: They are chafing at the continuing delays of the buses.
sentences.chinese: 他們因公共汽車連續晚點而不耐煩。

sentences.english: They waited at the bus stop forty minutes ago.
sentences.chinese: 他們什麼時候在車站等過公共汽車？

definition: shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
"through train" (refers to the idea of retaining previous legislature after transition to Chinese rule in Hong Kong or Macao)
